p: Following the first digestion, spin filters were washed with 40 μL of urea followed with 2X washes of 40 μL of ddH 2O, then, 3X washes with 100 μL of 50 mM ABC solution, followed by adding 0.1 μg/μL of trypsin in 1:100 and incubating at 37 °C O/N. Peptides were eluted, acidified with trifluoroacetic acid (TFA), and desalted on a C 18 MacroSpin column (The Nest Group, Southboro, MA). The concentration of the peptides was determined using a microplate colorimetric assay (BioRad).
